import React, { useState } from 'react' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Redirect, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom' import Navbar from './Navbar' import Search from './search/Search' // import ContentWrapper from './ContentWrapper' import DogsArchive from './saved_dogs/DogsArchive' import Menu from './Menu' import "../stylesheets/app.scss" function App() { const [dogs, setDogs] = useState([]) const [selectedBreeds, setBreeds] = useState([]) const handleBreedSelection = value => { setBreeds(value) } return (
) } export default App
